input.sentences: this cruiseliner decided to stop at this coastal city .
small vacation houses lined the shores for people to sleep in after going to the beach .
geese were common to this area .
some of the townspeople owned boats that they took out on weekeneds .
the geese squawked as the vacationers enjoyed the sights .
output.sentences: At the first stop we decided on a cruiseliner.
On our vacation we will sleep in colorful cabins near the shores.
Geese are common when we walk down to the shore.
On weekends the townspeople rented out the homes they owned to others on vacation.
The vacationers were annoyed when the geese squawked, but enjoyed the sights.
